property.name: height
property.description: point cloud structure height, if it's unordered height is 1

property.name: width
property.description: point cloud structure width, if it's unordered width is the length of the cloud

property.name: fields
property.description: describes the channels and their layout in the binary data blob

property.name: point_step
property.description: length of a point in bytes

property.name: row_step
property.description: length of a row in bytes

property.name: data
property.description: actual point data, size is (row_step * height)

property.name: is_dense
property.description: true if there are no invalid points
